titleStmt.title: A plaine and profitable catechisme with certaine prayers adioyned, meete for parents and housholders to teach their children and seruants.
titleStmt.author: Leech, James, fl. 1605.
More, John, d. 1592.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vniversitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: "To the Christian reader" signed: Iames Leech.

On signature A3v: "I confesse some good part of this was published many years since, gathered out of another cathechisme by a godly and reuerent preacher M. Moore of Norwich, which I haue altered and enlarged in many places". (Hence, this work may be based in part upon Edward Dering's "A short catechisme for househoulders", first published as "A briefe & necessary instruction.").
The text is continuous in spite of pagination.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library, Cambridge, Massachusetts.
